parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: True to anchor the table to the general table anchor point and ignore any coordinates specified for X and Y, or false to use the coordinates specified for X and Y

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate to insert this table annotation

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate to insert this table annotation

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Type of anchor as defined in swBOMConfigurationAnchorType_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the general table template to use (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Rows
parameters.description: Number of rows in the table annotation

parameters.name: Columns
parameters.description: Number of columns in the table annotation

title: IDrawingDoc.InsertTableAnnotation2
description: Inserts a table annotation in this drawing.
signature:

   System.Boolean
UseAnchorPoint
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Int32
AnchorType
,
   System.String
TableTemplate
,
   System.Int32
Rows
,
   System.Int32
Columns
)

parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: True to anchor the table to the general table anchor point and ignore any coordinates specified for X and Y, or false to use the coordinates specified for X and Y

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate to insert this table annotation

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate to insert this table annotation

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Type of anchor as defined in swBOMConfigurationAnchorType_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the general table template to use (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Rows
parameters.description: Number of rows in the table annotation

parameters.name: Columns
parameters.description: Number of columns in the table annotation

remarks:
If TableTemplate is...
Then..
A valid path and filename
AnchorType and Columns are ignored, and the information from the table template is used instead
Empty
General table is inserted based only on the other input arguments
